title: CASTLE ROCK Season 2 Episodes 1-3 Breakdown, Theories, and Details You Missed!
author: Think Story
comment: Please forgive me for the shorter video than my normal 10+minute per episode. I'll have to make it up to you all with ice cream! 🍦
That murder with the icecream scoop was one of the most brutal things I've seen in a long long time. I was completely thrown off by it and it really sticks in the back of my head.
She didn't have a narcotics addiction. Everytime she stole medicine it was antipsychotic medication.

That scene with Ace asking if the realtor could have kids really creeped me out. 

Also, killed by an ice cream scoop. Well, that’s a new one.
This season is so stressful to watch. Each episode loads the tension into a double barrel shotgun and blasts you full of holes.
description:
In this video we take a deep dive and review the first three episodes of Hulu's Castle Rock Season 2. We'll break down each episode, expand on theories and point of Stephen King easter eggs.

Follow me on twitter: www.twitter.com/thinkstoryYT
